components.name: Application Gateway
components.description: Acts as a load balancer and provides application-level routing.

components.name: Web App Firewall
components.description: Protects web applications from common threats.

components.name: Web App
components.description: The main application hosted on Azure.

data_flows.description: Users initiate a DNS lookup to access the application via a custom domain.
Traffic is routed through the Web App Firewall for security.
Traffic is distributed to the Web App after passing security checks.
Data is stored and retrieved from the Azure SQL Database.
User authentication and access management is handled.

trust_boundaries.name: User Access Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary between end-users and application components.

trust_boundaries.name: Data Storage Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary protecting data at rest in the database.
